trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were 2 other sightings in Los Angeles on or around January 3rd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS DRIVING WEST ON MELROSE AVE IN L.A. I STOPPED AT A SET OF LIGHTS. I LOOKED UP TO SEE A GLIMMERING OBJECT IN THE SKY THROUGH MY FRONT WINDOW AND NOTICED IT WAS FLYING VERY CLOSE TO AN AEROPLANE. I PICKED UP MY NIKON D700 WITH A 70-200MM LENS AND TOOK 2 PICS. THE LIGHTS CHANGED GREEN. I MADE A RIGHT TURN TO SEE IF I COULD GET A BETTER ANGLE THROUGH THE GAPS IN THE BUILDING BUT THE OBJECT HAD DISSAPEARED.
Summary: A silverish object in the sky
